thread.title: RICHARD SAMUEL ROSS TURNER
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by RICHARD SAMUEL ROSS TURNER

author: RICHARD SAMUEL ROSS TURNER
title: RICHARD SAMUEL ROSS TURNER
text: We did not have a booking when we hired the car at Brisbane airport. The lady we dealt with was very accommodating, pleasant and efficient. She spoke German. The car was beautifuly presented and drove very well. We extended the hire by three days which was seemless. Overall a very nice experience. All the staff I dealt with were extremely courteous. If I require rental cars in the future you will be my first choice
